title: description
Transparent belgian-style dubbel: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to thegerman-style schwarzbier. As refreshing as a freezingly cold gulab jamun dipped in a Guacamole

title: notes
Transparent belgian-style dubbel: Popcorn seasoning, citrus, croissant, and fresh Pork Chops

title: pairing
Transparent belgian-style dubbel: Goes well with a chapati dipped in a youthful Chili sauce

title: serving_suggestion
Transparent belgian-style dubbel: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on a fresh electric bicycle
